value.title: Use Custom Visuals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Watch how you can get customer visuals in Power BI from the marketplace, or use internal custom visuals that you may have within your organization.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Using Custom Format Strings in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Patrick walks you through how to use custom format strings in Power BI Desktop. From dates and time to numbers, he calls out some things to look out for.  Custom Format String Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/desktop-custom-format-strings  Download sample file: https://guyinacu.be/customformatstringsample

value.title: Visualize Graph Data in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you wondered how to visualize graph data? No, not Microsoft Graph. Graph Networks! Adam shows you how you can do this in Power BI Desktop.  Download sample: http://guyinacu.be/graphdatasample  Microsoft Graph API: https://docs.microsoft.com/graph/overview  Graphs and Networks https://www.mathworks.com/help/matlab/graph-and-network-algorithms.html
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/z14DV4_Liw4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: What are Power BI data connectors and why should you care?
value.excerpt: You need a connector to work with data in Power Query for Power BI or Excel. But what is a connector? Adam explains what these are and how to find out what's available.  Power Query Connectors: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-query/connectors/  Power BI data sources: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/connect-data/power-bi-data-sources

value.title: What the HECK is a Power BI Gateway Cluster?
value.excerpt: Confused about what a Power BI Gateway cluster is? Have your On-Premises Data Gateway installed but it's overloaded? This video is for you!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-high-availability-clusters  PowerShell: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-powershell-support

value.title: What's this Power BI report filtered by???

value.title: When is a date not a date in Power BI?
value.excerpt: When is a date not a date? We all use them in our data. Patrick looks at how data types can be a tricky thing in Power BI. value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Adam explores the data protection capabilities within Power BI using security labels and cloud app security.  Data Protection documentation overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-security-data-protection-overview

value.title: Working with Slowly Changing Dimensions in Power BI
value.excerpt: Do you have slowly changing dimensions in your Power BI dataset? Struggling to work with them to get the right values? Patrick walks you through how you can deal with them. value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)

value.title: Power BI Apps and App Workspaces: How to distribute Power BI content to a Large Audience
value.excerpt: Power BI Apps are a terrific way to distribute your Power BI content to a large audience.  You can "Publish App" to Entire Organization or specific individuals and groups. Then any user (within the Group you provided Access to) can click "Get Apps" to consume your App - which comprises the Dashboards,
